This film concerns hapless military computer guy Lasse, a happily married family man with one eight-year old tyke and a hot wife who is pregnant with their second child. Lasse works for the Swedish military, and is involved in the creation and testing of a high-tech device that allows fighter jets to avoid radar detection. Lasse is approached by some unsavoury mercenary types led by an English speaking Jacek, who wants Lasse to help him steal the high-tech doohickey. To convince Lasse, Jacek shows that he has intimate knowledge of Lasse?s activities and relatives, and even reveals that Lasses wife was pregnant and had a miscarriage, two things Lasse didnot have a clue about. Lasse reluctantly does Jaceks bidding, but proves to be just a bit smarter than the villains, and manages to prevent the theft of the McGuffin, if just barely. Further complicating Lasses stressful situation is Major Haglund, a military commando sent to oversee an important upcomingNATOmissile test.Acourtesy scene reveals that Haglund himself into his now-adult daughters life. is a wayward father, and he?s taken the job only because he wants to re-insert himself into his now-adult daughter?s life.
